targetTaxonomicAssay: 12S rRNA gene sequencing targeting the V5-V6 region using primers MiFish-F V2 and MiFish-R
16S rRNA gene sequencing targeting the V4-V5 region using primers 515F and 926R
18S rRNA gene sequencing targeting the V9 region using primers 1391F and EukBr
targetTaxonomicScope: Eukaryotes, with a focus on microbial eukaryotic lineages
